segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the water running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full and spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess she's making without even realizing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing on the floor, soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, that boy climbing on the stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, grabbing goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, arm up like she's begging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel scared just watching; he could tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a neat garden, so calm outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is chaotic inside compared to that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
